tasks.title: Fix authentication bug
tasks.description: Users can't log in with 2FA enabled. Error occurs on token validation.

tasks.title: Add rate limiting to API
tasks.description: Implement rate limiting to prevent API abuse. Use Redis for distributed rate limiting.

tasks.title: Update documentation for v2 API
tasks.description: Add examples and migration guide for new API endpoints.

tasks.title: Refactor error handling
tasks.description: Standardize error responses across all API endpoints.

tasks.title: Add unit tests for auth module
tasks.description: Increase test coverage for authentication module to 80%+.

tasks.title: Setup CI/CD pipeline
tasks.description: Configure GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment.

tasks.title: Optimize database queries
tasks.description: Reduce query time for user dashboard by adding indexes and optimizing N+1 queries.

tasks.title: Add logging
tasks.description: Add logging functionality to the project
